caption:
We caught up with Avnish Singhal, Executive Vice President - India & APAC, Emeritus, at the 3rd ASU+GSV & Emeritus Summit. He shared his key takeaways from the summit and the role of innovation in ensuring accessible and affordable education. 

#AllEyesOnIndia #EducationInnovation #Emeritus #ASUGSVEmeritusSummit #EmeritusIndia
